Literature.Title: To Fold or Not to Fold: Diastereomeric Optimization of an α-Helical Antimicrobial Peptide.
Literature.Author: Personne H, Paschoud T, Fulgencio S, Baeriswyl S, Köhler T, van Delden C, Stocker A, Javor S, Reymond JL

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli W3110(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>64µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCTC 418(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus COL(MIC=>64µg/ml)
